name: Amoeboid Changeling
oracle_text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
{T}: Target creature gains all creature types until end of turn.
{T}: Target creature loses all creature types until end of turn.

name: Aphetto Dredging
oracle_text: Return up to three target creature cards of the creature type of your choice from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Phage became both executioner and savior, helping others to the same rebirth she had found.

name: Clot Sliver
oracle_text: All Slivers have "{2}: Regenerate this permanent."
flavor_text:
"One would think I would be accustomed to unexpected returns."
—Hanna, *Weatherlight* navigator

name: Distant Melody
oracle_text: Choose a creature type. Draw a card for each permanent you control of that type.
flavor_text: Oona's song is like a twisted dinner chime. All the faeries return home, but it is Oona who feasts—on the stolen dreams and rumors they serve her.

name: Frenzy Sliver
oracle_text: All Sliver creatures have frenzy 1. (Whenever a Sliver attacks and isn't blocked, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)
flavor_text: The Arturan conjurers took the strange, alien fossil and patterned their own twisted creations in its image.

name: Gemhide Sliver
oracle_text: All Slivers have "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
flavor_text:
"The land is weary. Even Skyshroud is depleted. We must find another source of mana—one that is growing despite our withering world."
—Freyalise

name: Heart Sliver
flavor_text: Gerrard looked all around for the source of the mysterious pulse, and at that moment the slivers boiled forth from the crevasses.

name: Homing Sliver
oracle_text:
Each Sliver card in each player's hand has slivercycling {3}.
Slivercycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Sliver card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

name: Metallic Sliver
flavor_text: When the clever counterfeit was accepted by the hive, Volrath's influence upon the slivers grew even stronger.

name: Muscle Sliver
flavor_text: The air was filled with the cracks and snaps of flesh hardening as the new sliver joined the battle.

name: Quick Sliver
oracle_text:
Flash
Any player may cast Sliver spells as though they had flash.
flavor_text: The directors of the Riptide Project wanted instant results on the sliver experiments. They got their wish.

name: Rupture Spire
oracle_text:
Rupture Spire enters the battlefield tapped.
When Rupture Spire enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay {1}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

name: Terramorphic Expanse
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

name: Virulent Sliver
oracle_text: All Sliver creatures have poisonous 1. (Whenever a Sliver deals combat damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter. A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

name: Winged Sliver
flavor_text:
"Everything around here has cut a deal with gravity."
—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*
